content: Run echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Keyboard Input Display Example\007" to set terminal title
MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Rename format_test.rs to extras_test.rs using git mv
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after renaming
Create KeyboardInputHistory resource struct to track keyboard input state
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding resource
Add UI text display system with centered text node
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding UI
Implement keyboard event tracking system with duration calculation
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding tracking system
Update example structure with new systems and logging
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after final updates
Fix any clippy issues without using _ prefix or dead_code
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication and complexity (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with the user
